title: I Was Told That If I Confessed My Love For Her 100 Times, I Would Go Out With Her, So I Confessed 99 Times and Stopped - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Bickering Couple   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Oneshot   Short Story   Tsundere   Unrequited Love
author: Yorunosora   ヨルノソラ
description:
'If you confess to me 100 times, I'll go out with you.'

That's what she told me.
I must say that I did not confess to her.
This crazy girl said that to me out of the blue.

Then, I'll stand up to her, too.
The only way to compete with a crazy person is to step into the same ring.

So I decided to confess 99 times.
>
